revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=FriendlyARM |model=NanoPi R4 |revision=SE |asin=B0B7QXCGDZ |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=FriendlyElec |availability=currently shipping |price=86 |est_release_date=07/2022 |type=single-board computer, router |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=USB (Type-C) Female |cpu1_brand=Rockchip |cpu1_model=RK3399 |cpu1_cspeed=2.0 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=32 GiB |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=KLMBG2JETD-B041 |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=NetSol |ram1_model=S5RG2G20CMS-CGCJ |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model=RTL8111H |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Power Management IC w/ RTC;Rockchip;RK808-D;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;4;,,, 300mA, 0.9V CMOS LDO Regulator;Toshiba;TCR3UM09A;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy;SY6280;;2;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR837;;1;,,, 5.5V, 6A, 2.4MHz Synchronous Step Down Regulator;Silergy;SYR838;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;3;, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RTC |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Armbian, DietPi |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=pi |default_pass=pi }} {{TagLine|Single-board Computer}} :[https://www.friendlyelec.com/index.php?route=product/product&product_id=288 Product page]
"FriendlyElec", "NanoPi R4SE" and "2205" are silk-screened on both sides of board.
{{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://wiki.friendlyelec.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_R4SE ''NanoPi R4SE'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2022/07/24/nanopi-r4se-dual-gigabit-ethernet-router-32gb-emmc-flash/ ''NanoPi R4SE dual Gigabit Ethernet router adds 32GB eMMC flash'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3399 @2.0GHz Dual-Core ARM (Cortex-A72) :+ @1.4GHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A53) *Storage: 32GB (eMMC) Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 4GB (LPDDR4) SDRAM *Network: 2x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 3.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/3A via USB (Type-C)
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/NanoPi models}}
